document.full_text: president ronald reagan once famously said that a stack of $1,000 bills equivalent to the u.s. government's debt would be about 67 miles high.
document.title: pile of debt would stretch beyond stratosphere
lines_and_colors: president ronald reagan once famously said that a stack of $1,000 bills equivalent to the u.s. government's debt would be about 67 miles high.
